Updated 1/22/19
  • Carter Duong is a designer, developer, and artist from the Bay Area1+2 and based near Los Angeles3. He recently graduated from UC San Diego4 with a B.A. in Interdisciplinary Computing and the Arts.

  • Co-Editor, Art Direction, Design
    2017–2019

    A student-run publication that explores the culture of style, art, and design at UC San Diego.


  • Web Design, Development
    April 2018

    A microsite for a weekly radio show based out of KSDT at UC San Diego.


  • Game Design, Development
    November 2016

    A short game about being true to yourself.


  • 2018–2019

    Miscellaneous sketches in 3D and 2D.

Carter Duong is a designer, developer, and artist from the Bay Area1+2 and based near Los Angeles3. He recently graduated from UC San Diego4 with a B.A. in Interdisciplinary Computing and the Arts.
